content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to your location information to accurately answer your question. However, there are many car rental services available in most cities that you can consider as an alternative during the construction of new Metro lines. Here are some popular car rental services that you can check out:

1. Enterprise Rent-A-Car
2. Hertz
3. Avis
4. Budget
5. Thrifty Car Rental

When renting a car, it is important to consider factors like daily rates, fuel efficiency, and insurance coverage. Additionally, you may want to consider location convenience and ease of access to the rental service.

It is always a good idea to check with each car rental service in your area to compare prices and availability, as well as their policies regarding rental durations and insurance. Additionally, carpooling with others can also be a cost-effective and environmentally friendly option.
